attributes.action: Introduce free bus transfers on London buses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When travelling by tube, you can transfer train without charge. When travelling by bus, you need to buy a new ticket if you wish to transfer to a different bus route to complete your journey. Bus companies in other cities, such as San Francisco, issue time-limited transfer tickets that allow a free transfer onto a differnet bus route in order to complete your journey. This petition supports such a scheme in London.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
